thread.title: Fresh fears for Mischa Barton following meltdown
thread.title_full: Fresh fears for Mischa Barton following meltdown

title: Fresh fears for Mischa Barton following meltdown
text: Fresh fears for Mischa Barton as she is seen drinking, smoking and partying until 3am just weeks after shocking 'meltdown' Mischa Barton threatened to kill herself multiple times during her infamous meltdown last month Two neighbors who called 911 reported that the actress was in her backyard saying that she she wanted to die 'She's screaming and she just keeps on saying "I want to die" and then she's like "I'm going to kill myself" and it's all nonsensical,' said one neighbor That same neighbor claimed on the 911 call that paramedics were called out to Barton's home every few months The second neighbor who called said: 'She's saying that it's all over, that everything is done and then just wailing' Barton agreed to be hospitalized when paramedics arrived on the scene and later claimed she had been given the date rape drug GHB
